tour.Ghost uses Markdown to allow you to writ: Ghost uses Markdown to allow you to write and format content quickly and easily. This toolbar also helps! Hit the ? icon for more editor shortcuts.
tour.Welcome to Ghost Admin! From here you ca:
Welcome to Ghost Admin! From here you can browse your site, manage your content, and edit your settings.

You can always login to Ghost Admin by visiting {adminDisplayUrl}
tour.Static pages are permanent pieces of con: Static pages are permanent pieces of content which live outside of your usual stream of posts, for example an 'about' or 'contact' page.
tour.Depending on your theme, featured posts: Depending on your theme, featured posts receive special styling to make them stand out as a particularly important or emphasised story.
tour.Using custom themes you can completely c: Using custom themes, you can completely control the look and feel of your site to suit your branch. Here's a full guide to help: {link}

Ghost allows you to inject code into the: Ghost allows you to inject code into the top and bottom of your theme files without editing them. This allows for quick modifications to insert useful things like tracking codes and meta tags.
